GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
PIRACY.
1. M/V BW RHINE HIJACKED IN 06-01.4N 001-20.20E AT
   030840Z MAY. LAST KNOWN POSITION VICINITY
   05-27.00N 002-36.00E AT 030840Z MAY. VESSELS
   ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
   AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   TELEX: MA 34199, PHONE: 603 2031 0014,
   FAX: 603 2078 5769, E-MAIL: PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 938/12.
